text: Antonio de la Santísima Trinidad Pica Serrano (March 21, 1933 — April 26, 2014) was a Spanish actor. ==Early life== Pica was born in Jerez de la Frontera, Cádiz, Spain. ==Career== He appeared in over 60 movies since his career began in 1966. He worked with Sophia Loren and Christopher Plummer. He is known for his roles in Delusions of Grandeur (1971), Travels with My Aunt (1972) and The Killer with a Thousand Eyes (1974). ==Death== Pica died at a hospital in El Puerto de Santa María, Spain from an illness, aged 81. ==Movies== * Django Kill (1967) ... Tembler's Henchman * Bandidos ... 7 * Ringo the Lone Rider (1968) ... Sheriff * A Bullet for Sandoval (1969) ... Sam Paul * Delusions of Grandeur (1971) ... Grand d'Espagne * Travels with my Aunt (1972) ... Elegant Man * The Heroes (1973) ... Dietrich * Los Ojos Azules de la Muneca Rota (1973) ... Inspector Pierre * Vengeance of the Zombies (1973) ... Superintendent Hawkins * The Mark of Zorro (1974) ... Major de Colignac * Licántropo (1996) ... Comisario Lacombe ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:People from Jerez de la Frontera
title: Antonio Pica
